subject: Private Duty Nursing

overview.title: Private Duty Nursing
overview.purpose: To document the guidelines for accurate and consistent processing of Private Duty Nursing services claims.

effective_date: The processing guidelines outlined in this document are effective for dates of service (DOS) on and after April 1, 2021.
expected_outcome: Claims personnel will use the information and instructions provided in this document to adjudicate Private Duty Nursing services claims based on regulatory and health plan requirements and established Molina Claims Department guidelines.

Authorizations.Reference: Authorization Business Process – All States and LOBs - SOP and the Authorization Business Matrix – All States and LOBs - Reference
Authorizations.Note: Frequently updated reference documents may not provide a link.

UM Umbrella Authorizations.Description: Utilization Management (UM) will create one 'umbrella' auth per member to house the total number of approved Private Duty Nursing (PDN) hours for members receiving services from multiple independent nurses.
UM Umbrella Authorizations.Details: The umbrella auth will be created under Temporary Provider, and will include the following in the non-clinical notes:

Claim Form.Description: Claims for Private Duty Nursing services are submitted on the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services form (CMS-1500) and Uniform Billing form (UB-04).

Identifying Services for CMS-1500.Description: Review the following boxes to determine if services are processed under the Private Duty Nursing services processing guidelines:

Identifying Services for UB-04.Description: Review the following boxes to determine if services are processed under the Private Duty Nursing services processing guidelines:

CoveredBenefits.Description: Private Duty Nursing services are a covered benefit for the Molina Healthcare of New York (MHNY) health plan members aged 21 and over who are enrolled in the MLTC plan.

Codes.Description: Nursing care, in the home, by registered nurse, per hour
Nursing care, in the home, by licensed practical nurse, per hour

RemitCodes.Instruction: If a remit code is needed, select the remit code that best communicates the reason(s) for denial from those listed in the core claims processing system.

RevisionSummary.Comments: Added UM Umbrella Auth info in Authorizations section, made minor formatting updates.
